Hi <@U07RS65ADU7> I'm the product manager for the team that owns the custom workflow action API.

First, I would like to apologize for the unclear documentation and any frustration this may have caused. Making a note to get this updated!

Second, did you ever get your workflow action live? I would love to set up some time to get your feedback if you're open to it.
